events.title: Easter Egg Hunt
events.description: Tickets are on sale from March 4th through the 22nd. Come join us at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard for a fun-filled hour of hunting for colorful eggs hidden throughout the vineyard. Bring your friends and family for a day of excitement and laughter as you search high and low for the hidden treasures. Get ready to enjoy the beautiful surroundings of Nasketucket Bay Vineyard while participating in this classic Easter tradition. Don't forget to bring your Easter basket to collect all the eggs you find! Event admission is $5 per child, adult supervision is required. Adult admission is free!
events.body:
Come join us at **Nasketucket Bay Vineyard** for a fun-filled hour of hunting for colorful eggs hidden throughout the vineyard. Bring your friends and family for a day of excitement and laughter as you search high and low for the hidden treasures.

Get ready to enjoy the beautiful surroundings of **Nasketucket Bay Vineyard** while participating in this classic Easter tradition. Don't forget to bring your Easter basket to collect all the eggs you find!

Event admission is $5 per child, adult supervision is required. Adult admission is free! **This is a rain or shine event with no rain date scheduled. Please dress accordingly for the weather that day!**

events.title: Grand Opening - Day 1, Session 1
events.description: Nasketucket Bay Vineyard Grand Opening Weekend! Two Days, 7 Sessions, wine, food trucks and live music! Book your session ticket today to reserve your spot at our grand opening events. Ticket includes a free wine tasting (value: $15). THIS IS A 21+ EVENT Food Truck: No Joke Smoke Music: Randy Manyak
events.body:
**Grand Opening - Day 1, Session 1 (11:00 - 1:00)**

**Nasketucket Bay Vineyard** Grand Opening Weekend! Two Days, 7 Sessions, wine, food trucks and live music! Book your session ticket today to reserve your spot at our grand opening events. Tickets are $15 and include a free wine tasting (value: $15). 

**THIS IS A 21+ EVENT**

**Food Truck:** [No Joke Smoke](https://www.facebook.com/nojokesmokebbq)

**Music:** Randy Manyak

events.title: Fido Friday & Newport Chowder Company Food Truck
events.body:
**Fridays are for Fido, Food Trucks and Flight Specials!** 

*Our 4-legged friends are welcome on the patio or green spaces. 15% off wine flights and 15% off "barkuterie" boards from our store for your furry companion. The food truck will be pumping out delicious eats from 3-8.* 

**Today's Food Truck:** [Newport Chowder Company](https://www.facebook.com/NewportChowderCompany)

events.title: Mother's Day Brunch - Vineyard closed to the public from 11-2
events.body:
**THE VINEYARD WILL BE CLOSED TO THE PUBLIC FROM 11-2 DURING THE MOTHER'S DAY BRUNCH. THIS IS A TICKETED, 21+ EVENT.**

Buffet-style brunch, live music and a wine tasting (or 1 glass of wine) are included in your ticket price. Brunch will be served from 11-1:00. Live music by [Mike & Leah](https://www.facebook.com/jmichaelleach) is from 11-1:30. There are no table reservations for this event. Just grab a plate and sit wherever you like! The vineyard opens back up to the public at 2.

**Fridays are for Fido, Food Trucks and Flight Specials!**

*Our 4-legged friends are welcome on the patio or green spaces. 15% off wine flights and 15% off "barkuterie" boards from our store for your furry companion. The food truck will be pumping out delicious eats from 3-8.*

**Today's Food Truck: [BBQ Y Mas](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100089350611273)**
